Otc_please_note_content:
1.All the  Seller or Buyer accounts are verified physically by field trips and requested for 1 million CNYT assurance. Everytime you trade, the seller/buyer's assets will be freezed, when their assets are not sufficient, they cannot take the order. Please rest assure to trade.
2.All the Seller or Buyer accounts are verified with real name and ID. Please rest assure to trade.
3.Please use the bank cards which are owned by yourselves to transfer the payment. Any other payment method will be refunded. (Wechat Pay and Alipay is forbidden.)
Otc_system_does_not_provide_tradable_mer: 系统未提供可交易的商家
Otc_merchant_does_not_provide_bank_card_: 商家未提供银行卡信息
Otc_net_error: 网络连接失败，请稍后重试
Otc_buy_success: 买入成功, 请在1小时内按要求完成付款并确认, 逾期订单将被取消!
UpdateBank_please_note_content: 1.The card you add will be used for OTC transaction. If you use other bank card, it may cause the transaction failure. Please add it carefully.
UpdateBank_net_error: 网络连接失败，请稍后重试
UpdateBank_blind_card_failed: 银行卡绑定失败，请稍后重试
updateBank_enter_bank_account: 请输入开户银行, 至少四位
updateBank_enter_branch_account: 请输入开户支行名称, 至少四位
updateBank_enter_bank_card_no_at_least: 请输入银行卡号, 16-19位数字
OtcDetail_net_error: 网络连接失败，请稍后重试
OtcDetail_fill_in_50_words: 请填写投诉事由，50个字之内
payment_s_please_note_content:
1.请按信息向卖家汇款
2.汇款时一定要填写转账备注
3.卖家确认收到款后，货币将自动充值到您的账户上
4.请务必使用本人绑定的银行卡进行汇款,否则卖家可能不会确认收款
Allege_note_1: After sending complaints, please wait patiently for the contact from customer service. If there is other information you would like to tell, please send email to our customer service mailbox:
Allege_note_2: , our customer service specialist will work on it as soon as possible.
